mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 4-8, west wall
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Donohue, Liam Patrick [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Criticism of a third party named Becky for being ignorant despite blowing her money on education (the last bit of this rant is visible in picture 11 of this series). "Becky" here is likely a generic, stand-in name for rich and entitled white women. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]

You can spend $40,000 a year on tuition if you want, Becky. But you are still an over privileged ignorant human being, But I'm sure those Frye boots + expensive blow outs fill the void of human decency. | I'm going to make it through this year/life if it kills me.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Invective
Education, Higher
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
